dcterms:description: The Massive Text Embedding Benchmark (MTEB) provides a comprehensive assessment of model performance across a diverse range of text embedding tasks, serving as a valuable resource for identifying text embeddings that exhibit universal applicability across various tasks.
dcterms:title: Massive Text Embedding Benchmark (MTEB)

dcterms:description: The STSBenchmark is used for evaluating semantic textual similarity across multiple languages and focuses on cross-lingual evaluation.
dcterms:title: STSBenchmark

dcterms:creator: Tianyu Gao

dcterms:description: The Wikipedia Sentences dataset is utilized in SimCSE for generating sentence embeddings through contrastive learning.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia Sentences (used in SimCSE)
